dataIdInfo.idPurp: To create versions of local ballots tailored to voter location. Example: Voters in 3 precincts (13,17, & 24) live in Florida House District 34. The balance of Hernando County voters live in Florida House District 35. When a voter is handed their ballot, it must reflect correct geography for their location address.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: In order to create the different versions of local ballots, 39 Precincts have been split according to the overlapping layers of elected office holders. For example, a polygon was created for voters in Commission District 4, AND in Sterling Hill CDD, AND the Spring Hill Mandatory Trash Collection District. 76 polygons have been created.
dataIdInfo.suppInfo: The Central GIS file of 2010 Census Blocks was used to create this dataset as per the Florida Statutes. Dataset name: GIS.Census2010_CensusBlocks_Pop
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Caveat: The US Census Bureau created shoreline Census Block polygons which extend 5+ miles out into the Gulf of Mexico, thus the 'distorted' Hernando County coastline.
dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.4.4000

mdContact.rpOrgName: Hernando County Supervisor of Elections (SOE) / Hernando County Planning Department

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

overview.eaover:
Attribute Fields:
"ALL" Florida mandates this number "CC" Hernando County Commission District "CDD" GIS.HernandoCDDs (Community Development Districts)
"CNG" US Congressional District "CTY" City of Brooksville "GAR" GIS.Utility_WasteCollection (Mandatory Garbage Collection - MSBU) "HSE" Florida House District "SB" Hernando County School Board "SEN" Florida Senate District

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000
